valua.title: Drill: A Trap in the Forest
valua.description: This practice drill is a simulation from the archive to help you prepare for the coming battle. The current settings will allow you to reenact putting down a huge enemy incursion from the past. Your objective is to defeat a multitude of large enemies in each region.

yellow.description: This is a Battledia, where ARKS defenders can test their combat abilities. Make use of your battle skills to defeat all of the enemies.

purple.description: This is a Battledia, where ARKS defenders can test their combat abilities. Make use of your battle skills to defeat all of the enemies.
